page.heading: Questions and Answers
page.content: Questions asked and the answers given in all the recorded Way of Mastery sessions are here. Questions come from, The Early Years, The Way of the Heart, The Way of Transformation, and The Way of Knowing

page.heading: You Are the Answer: A Journey of Awakening
page.content:
It is Paul’s hope that this volume might encourage you and others to reach out, to become aware of the loving guidance which is ever presently available to you. It is further his hope that through your discovery of your relationship one has with one’s Guide, together with the absolute lack of need for any defensiveness—the fact that this relationship is experienced from one’s own Center—will begin to reveal that this is where all relationships occur in their Reality, rather than through three-dimensional space from body to body.
Rajpur ~ from the Foreward


 Start Reading

page.heading: Graduation: The End of Illusions
page.content:
This book will perhaps be the most difficult book you have ever read because it squarely calls the ego into question and gives you direction and encouragement regarding the only way to release it. It is not designed to be difficult. In fact, you will find the reading easy, palatable. The words will not be difficult to understand, but the movement they will create in you will.

This book will require you to move beyond understanding and dare to live from there! It brings the principles of A Course In Miracles into bold relief, whether you are a Course student or not. It brings the principles of Christian Science into bold relief, whether you are a student or not. It brings the principles of Life into bold relief, whether you are avoiding It or not. It addresses you in terms of your divinity and says, wake up! And it addresses you in the language of your humanity so that you might comprehend it.
Rajpur ~ from the Foreward


 Start Reading

page.heading: The Way of the Heart
page.content:
Jeshua's invitation to us is to wake up from every illusion that we have ever been separated from God, and to remember the deepest truth of who we really are: Christ.

The Way of the Heart is that pathway that begins with a commitment to healing and awakening, and is founded on the premise that you are perfectly free at all times. And everything that is experienced has been by your choice. And at no time has there been any other cause.

The Way of the Heart lessons, and original question and answer sessions, are the first year of 35 monthly lessons given by Jeshua during the years 1995-1997. Together they outline the steps and practices for awakening in Christ Mind.

page.heading: The Way of Transformation
page.content:
Jeshua's invitation to us is to wake up from every illusion that we have ever been separated from God, and to remember the deepest truth of who we really are: Christ.

The Way of Transformation is learning to transform your lived experience, so that you enjoy it more and more; are attached to it less and less; and fear it not at all.
~Jeshua

The Way of Transformation lessons, and original question and answer sessions, are the second year of 35 monthly lessons given by Jeshua during the years 1995-1997. Together they outline the steps and practices for awakening in Christ Mind.

page.heading: The Way of Knowing
page.content:
Jeshua's invitation to us is to wake up from every illusion that we have ever been separated from God, and to remember the deepest truth of who we really are: Christ.

The Way of Knowing is that way in which you have knowledge by direct experience, direct apprehension , by choosing to be only that…
~Jeshua

The Way of Knowing lessons, and original question and answer sessions, are the third year of 35 monthly lessons given by Jeshua during the years 1995-1997. Together they outline the steps and practices for awakening in Christ Mind.

page.content: The Early Years is a collection of messages from Jeshua given prior to The Way of the Heart
